derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : via Latin from Greek asphodelos; compare with daffodil

means.word_mean: 1. any of various chiefly Mediterranean plants of the genera Asphodeline and Asphodelus having linear leaves and racemes of white or pink or yellow flowers
